featured.text: Do you think Teresa asked that question on purpose? (A) accidentally (B) gradually (C) intentionally (D) permanently 17.

definition.zh_def: 特蕾莎，通常指特蕾莎修女，一位以慈善工作聞名的天主教修女。
definition.en_def: Teresa, often referring to Mother Teresa, a Catholic nun known for her charitable work.
definition.example: Mother Teresa dedicated her life to helping the poor and sick.
